summary.span: 对可选项列表提供了几个不同的可视化表示形式。

span.span: Provides several different visual representations for a list of selectable items.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类维持选定的单个或多个选定项。The class maintains the selection of single or multiple selected items. 直接从 类派生，并且不具有任何分页处理属性（如 属性）。The is derived directly from the class and does not have any of the pagination handling properties, such as the property. ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中， 类的属性 是在初始页面加载过程中创建的值的数组。In the following code example, the property of the class is an array of values that is created during the initial page load. 您可以更改属性的设置 ，以查看的不同版本 。You can change the setting of the property to see different versions of a . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k33801s3(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k33801s3(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建控件中的项 和数据绑定项时，此事件处理程序将从任意表达式设置列表项的属性。When an item in a control is created and data-bound, this event handler sets the properties of the list item from arbitrary expressions. 控件中的项 的类型为 。An item in a control is of type . 当绑定每个数据源项时，将引发此事件。This event is raised as each data source item is bound. 这是 通过使用或属性对集合中的项进行筛选或分组的最佳 时间 。This is the best time to filter or group items of the collection, by using the or property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 属性所引用的对象上的方法将 数据从客户端浏览器发送的 post 数据加载到控件中。The method uses the method on the object referenced by the property to load data into the control from the post data sent by the client browser. 如果在此控件上没有用于加载回发数据的特定于设备的处理，则该 方法将返回 `true` 。If there is no device-specific handling for loading the postback data on this control, then the method returns `true`.

The number of rows in the selection list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 4;最小值为1，无最大值。The default value is 4; the minimum is 1, with no maximum. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 回发上的属性来展开列表。The following code example shows how to use the property on postback to expand the list. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k33801s3(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k33801s3(v=vs.100)). member this.SelectedIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 返回选择的项的索引。

span.span: Returns the index of the selected item.

summary.span: 默认值为 -1。
此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The index of the selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件处于多重选择模式，此属性将返回第一个选定项的索引。If the control is in multiple selection mode, this property returns the index of the first selected item. 不能以声明方式设置所选索引;请 改用列表项的属性。The selected index cannot be set declaratively; use the property of a list item instead. 设置 为-1 以清除选定内容。Set the to -1 to clear the selection. 如果要从列表中动态删除项，这很有用。This is useful when you want to dynamically remove items from the list.

exception.span: 已尝试将 属性设置为小于 或大于等于项数。

span.span: an attempt was made to set the property to less than or greater than or equal to the number of items.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedIndexChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 每当用户更改 对象的选择时发生。

span.span: Occurs whenever a user changes the selection of a object.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改客户端上的选择不会生成回发事件。Changing the selection on the client does not generate a postback event. 如果回发事件由某个其他控件生成，并且选择已更改，则在服务器上调用此事件。This event is called on the server if a postback event is generated by some other control and the selection has changed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件。The following code example shows how to use the event. 它还演示如何使用 回发上的属性来展开列表。It also shows how to use the property on postback to expand the list. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k33801s3(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k33801s3(v=vs.100)). MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::MobileControls::ListSelectType SelectType { System::Web::UI::MobileControls::ListSelectType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::MobileControls::ListSelectType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于提供选择 UI 的 UI 类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of UI used to provide a selection UI.

summary.span: 必须是类型 。
默认值为 。
此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 用于提供选择 UI 的 UI 类型。

span.span: Type of UI used to provide a selection UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象可以呈现为、、、 `CheckBox` `DropDown` `ListBox` `MultiSelectListBox` 或 `Radio` 列表，具体取决于目标设备。A object can be rendered as a `CheckBox`, `DropDown`, `ListBox`, `MultiSelectListBox`, or `Radio` list, depending on the target device. 选择类型还会影响控件是否允许用户选择多个项。The selection type also affects whether the control allows the user to select multiple items. `MultiSelectListBox`和 `CheckBox` 设置允许选择多个选项; 其他设置只允许选择一项。The `MultiSelectListBox` and `CheckBox` settings allow multiple selections; other settings allow only a single selection. 下表显示了选择类型。The selection types are shown in the following table. |`ListSelectType` 值`ListSelectType` value|说明Description|多重Multiselect| |----------------------------|-----------------|-----------------| |`CheckBox`|呈现带有复选框和多重选择功能的列表项。Renders list items with check boxes and multiple selection capability.|是Yes| |`DropDown`|在下拉列表框中呈现列表项。Renders list items in a drop-down list box.|否No| |`ListBox`|在列表框中呈现列表项。Renders list items in a list box.|否No| |`MultipleSelectionListBox`|在具有多重选择功能的列表框中呈现列表项。Renders list items in a list box with multiple selection capability.|是Yes| |`Radio`|将列表项作为选项呈现。Renders list items as options.|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件。The following code example shows how to use the event. 它还演示如何使用 回发上的属性来展开列表。It also shows how to use the property on postback to expand the list. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k33801s3(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k33801s3(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileSelectionListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileSelectionListSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileSelectionListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileSelectionListSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]
